name: Welcome to the Ham Slam
description:
ESC - pause (you will need to tap twice in browser), MOUSE - move hammer, SPACE - retract, WASD - roll/look 

Click into the game to lock the mouse. Fullscreen recommended.

For some reason, the browser game hates Firefox. Seems to work fine in Chrome and Edge.

A game heavily inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy. My goal was to make a fun, gimmicky version that adds some mechanics to give it a twist. It was aimed to not be a rage game. Did I succeed? ...mmm, not sure. But it IS beatable.

This is just a playable version, but it should be feature complete. So the level design, puzzles, controls, highscore, etc. I still plan to work on the game in my free time. Hopefully, to slowly move it towards a more polished game. Since this was rushed just get a playable version, there's basically no polish...

This is actually supposed to be a part of a much grander project. Though, considering the time it took and my programmer artistic ability, I am not sure how that'll go. There's still so much to do...

If you encounter any gamebreaking bugs, feel free to reach out to me on my twitter: @MikoteyP

Hope you enjoy it!

This is a fan game. I am in no way associated with Hololive or Cover corp.

Hololive and its talents copyrights are owned by COVER corp ©2016
